#summary HotSpot Thread


==线程类型==
|| `vm_thread` || VMThread ||
|| `cgc_thread` || Concurrent GC thread ||
|| `pgc_thread` || Parallel GC thread ||
|| `java_thread` || Java线程 ||
|| `compiler_thread` || 编译线程 ||
|| `watcher_thread` || 观察线程 ||

线程类的结构图：
{{{
Thread
|-- NamedThread
|   |-- VMThread
|   |-- ConcurrentGCThread
|   `-- WorkerThread
|       |-- GangWorker
|       `-- GCTaskThread
|-- JavaThread
`-- WatcherThread
}}}
